messages.subject: Re: Dice
messages.msgSnippet: ... for ... For my toddlers, for whom small dice are dangerous, I buy Giant sized dice. They can also be bought at gaming stores and come in all the varieties
messages.messageBody:
>So I'm suggesting differently sized and shaped dice for stocking stuffers
for
>Christmas if you don't already own some.
>
>Betsy

For my toddlers, for whom small dice are dangerous, I buy Giant sized dice.
They can also be bought at gaming stores and come in all the varieties of
larger sizes that you mentioned (10, 12, 20, etc) as well as in 6 and 4
sided. We don't have a good gaming store in our new small town, so I asked
my brother and SIL to send us some giant sized dice for stocking stuffers,
as my kids have lost their dice from last year.

Nanci K.
